title: 106_s1577
content: Broadcast Ownership Reform Act of 1999 - Directs the Federal Communications Commission (FCC) to modify its rules for multiple ownership of television (TV) broadcast stations to increase to 50 percent the national audience reach limitations for TV stations owned by the same entity or person. States that the FCC's newspaper-broadcast cross-ownership rule shall cease to be in effect after December 31, 1999, unless it is reinstated by the FCC before January 1, 2000.
